Draft Rating:

Glen Grunwald ranks in the 13th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Grunwald's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 11 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.

Some of their biggest busts:

  • Drafted Morris Peterson with 21th pick but was worth 27th pick.
